properties.line1: Over 5.5+ years of extensive experience as a Front end web developer in developing and designing user experiences of web applications using HTML5, CSS, CSS3, SASS, LESS, JavaScript, ReactJs, Redux, ES6, Webpack, JSON, Node.js, Ajax, Bootstrap.
properties.line2: Experience in all phases of SDLC like Requirement Analysis, Implementation and Maintenance, and extensive experience with Agile and SCRUM.
properties.line3: Expertise in ReactJs along with experience in middleware using Redux, Redux Toolkit and other ReactJs libraries like React Router, Tanstack UI, Axios, Material UI, Stotybook and others.
